page.title: 03SERVICES-DUNTON GREEN
page.content: {Post Office}We do not have a main PO in our assigned block but 3 sub-post offices in Dunton Green,Riverhead & Chipstead. There are two collections & deliveries a day. {Medical}No doctors or dentists our block & nearly all the children in our class go to a large group practice of doctors just outside our area. Most go to Sevenoaks for their dentist. {Hospitals}We have no hospital either but a small hospital in Sevenoaks is used for minor matters. Other hospitals used from here are Pembury, Tunbridge Wells & Farnborough. {Fire}There is a large fire station just outside our area, and the firemen sometimes bring their appliance to visit us on request. {Refuse} Dustmen call once a week to collect rubbish which has to be left on the pavement ready for them.
